title: Pomegranate, Argan & Grapeseed Ultra-Moisturising Hand Therapy
description: Lock in lashings of moisture with our award-winning Hand Therapy. Infused with pomegranate, grapeseed and argan oils and fragrance notes of citrus and figs, this intensive macadamia nut oil- and shea butter-enriched cream nourishes skin so it's noticeably smoother after each luxurious application.

title: Crabtree & Evelyn - Gardener's Ultra-Moisturising Hand Therapy Pump - 250g/8.8 OZ
description: After a long day of handling thorny situations, our new hand therapy pump is just the help you need. It contains shea butter as well as extracts of yarrow, clover and calendula to help soothe and condition work-roughened hands.

title: Vitabath Bath and Shower Gel, Beach Blossom, 12 Ounce
description: The beach in a bottle! Imagine soft sea breezes mingled with subtle florals, sand and sunshine. Experience the luxurious lather of this gently cleansing sulfate and paraben free formula.
